summary.span: Hosts and formats flow content with advanced document features, such as pagination and columns.

span.span: Hosts and formats flow content with advanced document features, such as pagination and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 中所包含的最上層子項目必須衍生自。Top-level child elements contained in a must be derived from . 有效的最上層子項目包括：Valid top-level child elements include the following: - - - - - 預設值如包含用來顯示文件，如果您使用為 XAML 檔案中的根元素。The default for contains a that is used to display the document if you use as the root element in a XAML file. 如果不是根項目，可以在顯示的文件、 ，或控制項。If is not the root element, the document can be displayed in a , a , or a control. 您也可以編輯中控制項。You can also edit a in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的輸入類型`block`包含， ， ， ，和。Valid input types for `block` include , , , , and . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 在此情況下，包含所組成的一次文字往返的段落中的巢狀資料流程項目區塊結構。In this case, the contains a flow element block structure consisting of a text run nested in a paragraph. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentConstructorSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentconstructorsimple)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentConstructorSimple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentconstructorsimple)] 下列範例以程式設計方式建構簡單的 2x2 資料表，然後再使用建構函式來建立新的包含資料表。The following example programmatically constructs a simple 2 x 2 table and then uses the constructor to create a new containing the table. 雖然使用較為複雜的資料流程元素區塊結構時，使用建構函式是相同，如上述範例所示。Though a somewhat more complicated flow element block structure is used, use of the constructor is the same as in the preceding example. MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ColumnGap { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ColumnGap : double with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the column gap value, which indicates the spacing between columns in a .

span.span: Gets or sets the column gap value, which indicates the spacing between columns in a .

value.span: 欄間距 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: The column gap, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 值為(相當於屬性值的"自動」) 指出欄間距等於屬性。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") indicates that the column gap is equal to the property.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前的資料行間距。Getting this property returns the current column gap. 設定此值變更的目前有效的資料行間距，而可能導致重新排列的內容。Setting this value changes the currently effective column gap, and may cause content to reflow. 欄間距不能超過目前減去任何。The column gap cannot exceed the current minus any . 如果值屬性超出此限制，有效的資料行間距會降低觀察這項限制。If the value of the property exceeds this limit, the effective column gap is reduced to observe this limit. 如果這個屬性就不會影響是`null`。This property has no effect if is `null`. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: Gets or sets the used to draw the rule between columns.

span.span: Gets or sets the used to draw the rule between columns.

value.span: 資料行之間繪製尺規則時要使用的 ，或者若不使用背景筆刷，則為 。

span.span: A to use when drawing the rule line between columns, or to not use a background brush.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行規則是內容的一條線來繪製資料行，之間，用來以視覺化方式分隔資料行。The column rule is a line that is drawn between columns, and is used to visually separate columns of content. 顯示可用的預先定義筆刷色彩的樣本的資料表，請參閱。For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see . 如果這個屬性就不會影響屬性為 0 或`null`。This property has no effect if the property is 0 or `null`. 當有兩個或多個資料行，會顯示資料行的規則。Column rules are displayed only when there are two or more columns. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentcolumnrule)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentcolumnrule)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the column rule width.

value.span: 欄尺規寬度 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行規則是內容的一條線來繪製資料行，之間，用來以視覺化方式分隔資料行。The column rule is a line that is drawn between columns, and is used to visually separate columns of content. 如果這個屬性就不會影響屬性是`null`。This property has no effect if the property is `null`. 有兩個或多個資料行時，只會顯示資料行的規則。Column rules are only displayed when there are two or more columns. 欄尺規寬度限制為小於或等於。The column rule width is constrained to be less than or equal to the . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ColumnWidth { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ColumnWidth : double with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the minimum desired width of the columns in a .

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum desired width of the columns in a .

value.span: 最低所需的資料行寬度，以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

span.span: The minimum desired column width, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 值為造成只有一個資料行顯示，不論頁面寬度。

span.span: A value of causes only one column to be displayed, regardless of the page width.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A動態調整其內容，將內容呈現內可用的顯示空間最大化。A dynamically adjusts its contents to maximize content presentation within the available display space. 可見的資料行的數目取決於可用的顯示空間，指定這個屬性所指定的最小的資料行寬度所能容納的資料行數目。The number of visible columns is determined by the number of columns that can fit in available display space, given the minimum column width specified by this property. 實際的資料行的寬度可能會大於這個屬性所指定的值。The actual column width may be greater than the value specified by this property. 在任一方向的視窗大小變更會導致資料行正在以動態方式重新產生以充分利用的空間。Changing the size of the window in either direction will result in columns being dynamically regenerated to make the best use of space. 如此一來，內容會動態適應到使用者的環境。In this way, the content dynamically adapts to the user's environment. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content in a .

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content in a .

value.span: 其中一個值，指定相對的資料流程方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前有效的文字方向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 設定這個屬性會導致的內容以指定方向的方向。Setting this property causes the contents of the to reflow in the indicated direction. 的內容通常會對應到所表示之語言的固有流向。The of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯來文和阿拉伯文是由右至左的語言的範例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英文、 德文與俄文是範例的自然流程從左到右的語言。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性的值不會自動變更為符合作業系統所使用的語言。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果您需要使用不同的值，則預設值是，您必須指定它自己。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentflowdirectionxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentflowdirection)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentflowdirection)]

member this.FontFamily : System.Windows.Media.FontFamily with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

value.span: A物件，指定慣用的字型家族，或主要慣用的字型家族，其中包含一個或多個後援字型家族。

span.span: A object specifying the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 預設值是由所決定的字型值。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何子項目上的設定會覆寫這個最上層的設定。Any settings on child elements will override this top-level setting. 當指定多個系列時，第二個和後續的字型系列會做為後援，可在其中主要字型家族是無法使用或不適用的情況下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此屬性會指定只在喜好設定。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字型家族沒有會以無訊息模式切換回所決定的字型值。If the specified font family is not available, the will silently fall back to the font determined by the value. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsColumnWidthFlexible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsColumnWidthFlexible : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the value is flexible or fixed.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the value is flexible or fixed.

value.span: 如果資料行寬度具有彈性。如果資料行寬度固定的。

span.span: if the column width is flexible; if the column width is fixed.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定在資料行之間會發佈任何超出內容區域的寬度 （也就是頁面寬度 」 和 「 內容後已配置版面的寬度之間的差異） 的方式。The property determines the manner in which any excess content area width (that is, the difference between the page width and the width of the content after it is laid out) is distributed among columns. 如果設定為`true`表示額外的空間發佈的平均每個資料行; 在此情況下，可能更寬比所指定的寬度調整大小資料行屬性。A setting of `true` means that the extra space is distributed equally to each column; in this case, columns may be sized wider than the width specified by the property. 如果設定為`false`方法多餘的空間會發佈到頁面的右邊的邊框間距; 在此情況下，資料行一定的大小會根據指定的寬度屬性 (只要該寬度小於頁面的寬度減去任何 < c4 > )。A setting of `false` means excess space is distributed to the padding on the right side of the page; in this case, columns will always size to the width specified by the property (so long as that width is smaller than the width of the page minus any ). 下圖說明在配置的差異，當此屬性為`true`或`false`。The following figure illustrates the difference in layout when this property is `true` or `false`. 淺藍色代表資料行中的內容。Light blue represents columns of content in a . ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值")![Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlexXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentcolumnflexxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlex](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentcolumnflex)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlex](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentcolumnflex)]

Public Shared ReadOnly IsColumnWidthFlexibleProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsHyphenationEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsHyphenationEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation of words is enabled or disabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation of words is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果已啟用自動中斷和單字的斷字。，否則， 。

span.span: if automatic breaking and hyphenation of words is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動文字斷字功能可讓自動中斷並斷字，根據目前配置的條件。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 這可讓開始在同一行，再繼續此下一步，較長的文字，並通常會以達到更平均地分散對齊的文字中的空白字元。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 單字會中斷，根據標準的文法規則進行無連字號。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. 自動斷字會特別有效的最佳段落配置結合時 (由屬性)。Automatic hyphenation is particularly effective when coupled with optimal paragraph layout (represented by the property). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenthyphenatexaml)] 下圖顯示如何上述呈現。The following figure shows how the preceding renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 啟用 FlowDocument 連字號](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument 連字號已啟用")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下圖顯示如何相同呈現的預設值為 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenthyphenate)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenthyphenate)]

Public Shared ReadOnly IsHyphenationEnabledProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsOptimalParagraphEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsOptimalParagraphEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether optimal paragraph layout is enabled or disabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether optimal paragraph layout is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果啟用最佳段落配置;否則， 。

span.span: if optimal paragraph layout is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最佳段落版面配置是一項功能，配置中的段落，儘可能平均分佈泛空白字元。Optimal paragraph layout is a feature that lays out paragraphs in the such that white space is distributed as evenly as possible. 理論上來說，這會藉由消除可能發生的行靠右對齊的文字和其他配置常式令人分心泛空白字元提供最佳化的閱讀經驗。Theoretically, this provides an optimized reading experience by eliminating distracting white space that can occur with line-justified text and other layout routines. 會自動斷字的結合時，特別有效; 最佳段落配置 (由屬性)。Optimal paragraph layout is particularly effective when coupled with automatic hyphenation (represented by the property). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenthyphenatexaml)] 下圖顯示如何上述呈現。The following figure shows how the preceding renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 啟用 FlowDocument 連字號](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument 連字號已啟用")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下圖顯示如何相同呈現的預設值為 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenthyphenate)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenthyphenate)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果上一段連續體中，檢視屬性會優先於屬性，接著會優先於屬性。If viewed on a continuum, the property takes precedence over the property, which in turn takes precedence over the property. 如果所有的三個屬性都設定在指定的頁面上，這是評估屬性的順序。If all three properties are set on a given page, this is the order in which the properties are evaluated. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness PagePadding { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.PagePadding : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thickness of padding space between the boundaries of a page and the page's content.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thickness of padding space between the boundaries of a page and the page's content.

value.span: A與裝置無關的像素中指定要套用的填補數量的結構。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以描述為所有方向統一 (`PagePadding="10"`)，或是為四個不同的值表示左，排名最前面，以滑鼠右鍵，然後下方填補獨立 (`PagePadding="5,0,10,20"`)。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`PagePadding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`PagePadding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的填補框線粗細超過相對應的頁面維度 （例如，左和右邊框間距寬度的總和超過頁面寬度），邊框距離厚度會按比例縮減為不可以大於相關的頁面維度.If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding page dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the page width), the thickness of the padding will be proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant page dimension. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTextAlignmentXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenttextalignmentxaml)] 下圖顯示如何上述呈現文字對齊方式 （預設值）。The following figure shows how the preceding renders with text alignment (the default). ![螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Left")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left") 下圖顯示如何相同呈現文字對齊方式。The following figure shows how the same renders with text alignment. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 權限的 TextAlign 值](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 值為 Right")![Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right") 下圖顯示如何相同呈現文字對齊方式。The following figure shows how the same renders with text alignment. ![螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只會套用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字型。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 印刷樣式變化的效果沒有上不支援 variant 的字型。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 如需有關本主題的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 中的印刷樣式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定各種使用的印刷樣式變化屬性項目。The following example shows how to set various typography variations with the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTypographyXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenttypographyxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定各種層面的屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set various aspects of the property programmatically.
